sentences.en: A cobweb fell across her forehead and seemed to try to restrain her.
sentences.cn: 一张蜘蛛网粘到她的前额上,像要阻拦她前进.

sentences.en: A hollow core and cobweb - structured cladding Bragg fiber that supports circular - polarization - maintaining single - mode is presented.
sentences.cn: 运用渐近转移矩阵公式,研究了一种保持圆偏振态 单模 蜘蛛网结构包层空芯光纤.

sentences.en: All this he asidethough it were cobweb, ignoring it, answering only when extreme necessity compelled him.
sentences.cn: 他对这一切毫不在意,把它们当做蛛丝一样轻轻抹去, 只是在万分必要时才给予答复.

sentences.en: Friends tie their purses cobweb thread.
sentences.cn: 朋友之间,不应扎紧钱袋.

sentences.en: I have a cobweb in the throat.
It was exquisite, silk, handmade and trimmed with a cobweb of lace.
sentences.cn: 它很精致 、 丝质 、 手工缝制,周围有一圈密密的花边.

sentences.en: Keratoprotein constitutes hair, nail, feather, silk and cobweb.
sentences.cn: 角质蛋白构成毛发 、 甲 、 毛 、 丝及蛛网.

sentences.en: Let's go for a walk and blow the cobweb away.
sentences.cn: 咱们去散散步,清醒一下头脑.

sentences.en: Manna in cobweb lusters with lightness.
sentences.cn: 蛛网上的甘露光彩轻盈.

sentences.en: My face tickles all over with cobweb sensation, but I ignore it.
sentences.cn: 我的脸像粘上蜘蛛网一样发痒, 但是我不予理会.

sentences.en: Sea route, be like cobweb closely, traffic is busy degree each are not identical.
sentences.cn: 海上航线, 密如蛛网, 交通繁忙程度各不相同.

sentences.en: The fabric, cut on the bias, hangs as light as a cobweb off a woman's body.
sentences.cn: 这块斜裁料如蛛网一般轻盈地从一女子身上垂下来。

sentences.en: The spider can catch insects by cobweb.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛能用蜘蛛网抓住昆虫.

sentences.en: The web may be a combined effort of social cobweb spiders.
sentences.cn: 巨型蜘蛛网可能是由群居的蜘蛛共同织造成.

sentences.en: The windows are cracked and covered in cobwebs.
sentences.cn: 窗户裂开了，上面布满蜘蛛网。

sentences.en: Your sister is right, you need a break to get the cobweb out of your head.
sentences.cn: 你妹妹说得对, 你该好好休息让脑子清醒一下.

words.tran_cn: 蛛网密布的；蛛网似的；布满蜘蛛网的
